com.percussion.pso.utils
Class PSOParseUrlQueryString

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.pso.utils.PSOParseUrlQueryString

public class PSOParseUrlQueryString
extends Object

Parses the name=value components of a URL's query string into a Map. Based on (obfuscated) com.percussion.server.content.PSFormContentParser.

Method Detail

parseParameters

public static Map<String,Object> parseParameters(String paramString)
                                          throws com.percussion.server.PSRequestParsingException
Add the request parameters defined in the specified parameter string to the specified hash map.

Parameters:
paramString - the URL query string, may not be null, can be empty.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if paramString is null
com.percussion.server.PSRequestParsingException - if an error occurs parsing the parameters.

urlDecode

private static String urlDecode(String str)
                         throws com.percussion.server.PSRequestParsingException
Throws:
com.percussion.server.PSRequestParsingException

convertEntities

private static String convertEntities(String query)
Replaces all occurrences of entity refs allowed in URL query strings with their corresponding character. Currently, this is just &

In XHTML, the ampersand used to separate params in the query string must be escaped because it is an xml document.

Parameters:
query - The query string from a URL. If null or empty, it is returned unmodified.
Returns:
The supplied query with all entity refs replaced with their corresponding character.
